documents.document: @CitizenJaneInAu I completed a law degree while working and raising three kids we are THE BEST he knows nuthin
@Carolin35724834 @MickKime yup. That's patriarchy for ya. No fcukn idea who does what
@peta_sykes we are all good never been stronger all power to ya my sis we make it on our own round here ðŸŽ‰ðŸ’ªðŸ¼ðŸ’•
@peta_sykes any time he hit me where it hurts too but ya know we are stronger than a thousand fuckheads like him and our kids are too
@nonsibicunctis good well speak up to men maybe they'll listen
@LJMURPHY1910 I'm wondering why the political landscape is dominated by useless white men lol just kidding
@ajf247 every man has a mother. Pity patriarchy instead. Look at how it invests in denial of basic facts
@BevJohnst @NannanBay anytime:) I was saying earlier I've missed #NPC for months it was a bit of a snarky treat for me ðŸ˜œ
@ItsBouquet Go him! And go you. Our kids are everything and we're leaving them such a damn mess it hurts my head n heart @YaThinkN @nobby15
@YaThinkN it is! Night mate. Love your work x
@YaThinkN whoot! We're in, we're up, we're on \0/
@YaThinkN well they've had it too easy. But I genuinely do not know what mobilises people, that tipping point, and I've researched it
@YaThinkN SO PROUD. No mealy-mouthed gutless excuse-making bystanders in MY family
@YaThinkN definitely but I think even local political engagement is better than a kind of middle class spoilt white folk isolationism
@YaThinkN yup. I can not imagine what it's like to think oh well I'll get punched but ya gotta do the thing https://t.co/pBVRqoh582
@YaThinkN I was at a VERY conservative family DO when rellos started talking about amalgamation I was whoah this is big
@YaThinkN congrats to you. My adult one stands up against men who are violent to women and for Aboriginal rights go figure ;-)
@parakev TY my credo is I heard what I heard and I called it as I heard it
@YaThinkN yeah my parents got active around Baird's amalgamations and they usually prefer not to engage in public policy
@YaThinkN this is good she is very clear and engaging I like it
@YaThinkN unless the issue is local and regional and broader? CSG is definitely in that category
@YaThinkN yes exactly! I think there's a much more human element to local politics in those contexts
@YaThinkN it was totally worth it for holding local govt to account. Councils are so much closer to the local population in the regions
@YaThinkN ha! You just described the climate march in Coonabarabran but y'know it was what it was. Solidarity. And I cornered the mayor so..
@parakev lol TY!! I just finished teaching summer school and took a reccy day to watch (and mock) #NPC it's a bit therapeutic ðŸ˜‰
@YaThinkN I know what you mean it's a different culture even researching the Pilliga campaign compared to Sydney activism was eye-opening
@YaThinkN many do, many don't... but yeah she is second to none on dehumanisation of welfare recipients I'll ask her
@happybuddha63 sure but he still represents a totally mainstream view. I'm a single mum I meet men like him ALL. THE. TIME
@happybuddha63 it has come to this ðŸ˜‡ðŸ’£
@YaThinkN yeah so easy to default to our own. A mate of mine who organised the cashless welfare rallies might come on board?
@Kersebleptes yeah conservatives have always loved em a bit of unaccountable power and control over everyone but them damn selves
@YaThinkN *nods* good, good, sounds like a well-rounded team is taking shape. But intersectionality is imperative. We can't be all white
@Kersebleptes just like a staged Trump event ay. How edifying
@YaThinkN *clears throat* feminists don't let women friends call themselves dumb >-<
@YaThinkN you really do but sure, happy to offer feminist frameworks. Also she could look up intersectionality to set out on a robust foot
@YaThinkN no worries my students are mainly her age and young women thank me every semester for including feminist perspectives @Forthleft2
@ResignInShame very hard. Or people tag me into his toons on FB and I'm like ahem yah seen it guess why *blows fingers*
@YaThinkN @PolitiScopeOz @Forthleft2 okay yup me n Denise DMd when she set it up I look forward to hearing how it's going
@ResignInShame no doubt. I think my proudest Twitter moment was the First Dog follow omg I wanted to screenshot boast but ya know. Tacky
@Forthleft2 OMG I think I know that guy ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ @YaThinkN @TDKHour
@YaThinkN @Forthleft2 allo allo allo wots all this then
@ResignInShame lololol you're secret is safe with me. Morrison follows a mate of mine who is Wisconsin born hahaha can you imagine
@stingos2004 *bows* why thank ya
@ResignInShame yeah agree 100% he's revolting too but hell will freeze over before I even vaguely imply any sympathy for Slipper
@ResignInShame it would, but Ashby always invokes the Slipper apologist crowd. I hate him. Here's the slimy shitheaâ€¦ https://t.co/5ZuU3rKYMM
@14luxor yeah I know. There's no shortage of people kicking Poorline. My rule is punch up: white men, the repulsive Liberal National govt
@14luxor the pig. I just heard neither Labor nor Liberals have ruled out a preference deal with PHON coz hating on single mums so wot right
@sulphura yup. The craven chuckles at weak and unfunny "jokes" turn my stomach. It's the same with professors' speeches. Cringeworthy
@nonsibicunctis and the ingrained attitude of a nasty patriarchal society
@sulphura lol Ingrid M citizen journo nah I don't envy their job but some gutsiness would be useful for the quality of the polity
@boypage yep no argument from me. There's still the white law position and the true position. We might get somewhere when the two align
@boypage he got into that many fights. But you're both right. As in ongoing invasion and colonisation coexist with always was always will be
@boypage ugh yeah and the English. My son moved back from Darwin stayed in a hostel the UK boys wd say we own your country n shit like that
@boypage well I'm pretty white. My sis-in-law pulls me up 'ingrid do you hafta be so white?' Lolol I say 'I'm doing my best here my sis'
@boypage for sure, love to. Uncle is in Western Sydney now he does a lot of Welcomes but he always mentions LaPa too
@boypage that's the road! Where Ingelba creek crosses south of Walcha you look inland, that's their country. Re LaPa I only know Uncle Greg
@boypage not at all! Dunghutti and Anaiwan born in Armidale with strongest family ties at Walcha and ancestral lands at Ingelba
@boypage yeah but you know how defensive people get. And first gen Austs *always* say their parents worked hard. They can't hear themselves
@boypage That's what their fam says ðŸ’ªðŸ¼But i try to explain patiently coz too many people take their ignorance out on kids
@boypage I hear it a lot coz my kids are Aboriginal. When I tell people they get nervous and want to ask if I am then the "part" Q comes out
@boypage always a red flag that one
@Iheartskwerls @jouljet yeah or how we could, you know, just stop spending billions to destroy people
Really smh? Your takehome from that litany of lies was his BS about power prices in a parallel universe where Labor won the election?
@JrehnJ \0/ any time! They'd drive me spare without the tweets
@NannanBay heh glad to hear it a swim is much less likely to burst a pfooffle valve than that #NPC travesty
@alison_rixon lol *bows* I haven't watched #NPC in a while it's generally not good for my well being ðŸ˜Ž
@camybobany @NannanBay lol thx i've missed the last few #NPC been teaching summer school, just lucky it was the PM today I guessðŸ˜œ
@Boeufblogginon these no-nothing bozos. How many mums has he insulted in one sentence
"We do not compromise on keeping Australians safe" nah you do. You really really do. Or don't women and children count as Australians? #NPC
Turnbull just went the full Abbott on the "scourge" of "Da'esh" (who have killed no Aust women). We are "intimately engaged" so gross #NPC
Oh look, like Trump's #MuslimBan the PM is not a "commentator" on One Nation. In other words he is happy to enable islamophobia #NPC
Could you outline how you know what the deficit is in the alternative universe where you lost the last election and not just 14 seats? #NPC
PM "not expecting" another quarter of downturn. Surely he knows only his massive spending govt saw off negative growth last year? #NPC
White man journo tells white man PM that white man small biz owner wants more handouts from the Aust public. What a circle jerk #NPC
A man completely beholden to and hobbled by extremists like Bernardi tells the #NPC that he is a pragmatist and not an ideologue
Wealthy white men tell the weakest shittiest "jokes". We're trained to *chuckle appreciatively* at their unfunny but powerful words #NPC
@ozAntinnippon @cat240359 SHOULD be National police check
@ozAntinnippon lol National press club
Heh Mark Kenny Q on tax cuts prompts the hallmark throat-clearing "let me explain" paternalistic free-market 101 trope-laden lecture #NPC
"My donations to the Liberal Party have been regular and generous heh heh heh" cue audience chuckles and on we move #vom #NPC
Oh yeah the other fail-safe signal of an idea-free zone: invoking our children and our grandchildren. Worst political cliche ever #NPC
No peacetime govt has wasted more public funds on non-existent threats and torturing people fleeing persecution than mine #paraphrasing #NPC
Quickest way to spot an over-promoted, unoriginal, conservative ideas vacuum is the time and effort they invest in lying about the left #NPC
Australia is the world's largest exporter of coal says our crony capitalist PM like it's a good thing #NPC
Gas, bc wind & solar are "intermittent renewables" hmm if only there was some way of storing power like the gunpowder batteries of old #NPC
Govt and industry must work together to secure emissions reduction LOL coz LNP and INDUSTRY have such a GREAT RECORD on climate policy #NPC
Housing affordability from a wealthy white male heir who costs the public $3 million to "secure" his $50 million Point Piper pile okay #NPC
He's speaking to political donations on the sae day he refused to disclose his own donation christalive imagine being this man's brain #NPC
Transparency and integrity are Liberal and National values lololol every day is Opposite Day in conservative old white bloke land #NPC
He didn't call us ugly. He called our children ugly. He didn't attack "single parents". He attacked SINGLE MOTHERS https://t.co/d7hCPNzsym
@HEB2205 this nasty pattern is as old as colonialism, as old as empire, as old as patriarchy. We know how it goes
With apologies to Dr King, the arc of the immoral white patriarchal universe bends towards weaponised, state-funded, violent control
Having been forced to accept women & Aboriginal people as citizens with basic rights, white patriarchy turns its worst self to non-citizens
Either way, on both sides of the Pacific, obscenely wealthy white men decide to cruel the lives of people of colour fleeing persecution
@jouljet of course we could. We could meet our UNHCR obligations too. The entire shitshow is built on the natsec exception in Art 33(2)
The dominant narrative will blame "racist bogans" when the men who do this are voted in by Sydney's eastern suburbs and Qld's Gold Coast
And the Australian government will have enabled these killings and made the Australian public fund these killings
The refugees will be assaulted, killed by white supremacists and white supremacist governments or their persecutors in country of origin
Or the refugees will enter the US and targeted by violent racists enabled by Trump; or "extreme vetted" and refouled to further persecution
Either refugees will be left in limbo on Manus and Nauru in torturous conditions which cause mental injury, controlled by violent staff
